last_episode_to_air.name: Turkey
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dr. Sanjay Gupta travels to Turkey, a cultural crossroads where science and mysticism coexist, to find alternative ways of managing health and fighting disease.

name: Chasing Life with Dr. Sanjay Gupta
original_name: Chasing Life with Dr. Sanjay Gupta
overview: Dr. Sanjay Gupta travels around the world to find where people live longer, happier, and more functional lives than anywhere else on the planet.
